Title: Initialize Flutter Web project
Description: Create Flutter project, enable web, set HTML renderer in dev.

Title: Integrate Firebase (Auth/Firestore/Storage)
Description: Add Firebase to web, add firebase_options.dart, test connection.

Title: Configure CI for Web build
Description: GitHub Actions workflow to build Flutter web on push/PR.

Title: Enable Dart lints/formatter
Description: analysis_options.yaml and formatting checks.

Title: Material 3 theme (light/dark)
Description: Create ThemeData, toggle, persist preference.

Title: go_router routes per spec
Description: Public routes; account and admin shells with guards.

Title: Login page (email/password)
Description: Form validation, integrate Firebase Auth.

Title: Auth guards for /admin and /compte
Description: Role-based redirects; unauthorized handling.

Title: Home page with hero and CTA
Description: Hero section, services preview, testimonials.

Title: About page
Description: Mission, valeurs, certifications, équipe.

Title: Expertise page
Description: VOIX, AUTOMATISME, DATA, COURANT FORT, VIDEO, DOMOTIQUE.

Title: Services page (catalog)
Description: Grid/list of services with cards and filters (MVP).

Title: Service detail page
Description: Dynamic route /services/:id, description, image, pricing/tarif.

Title: Contact page + submit
Description: Store MessageContact in Firestore; confirmation.

Title: Client – Documents
Description: List and download documents from Storage.

Title: Client – Communications
Description: List messages/notifications, mark read/unread.

Title: Client – Contrats
Description: Show subscription status, dates, linked docs.

Title: Admin – CRUD ServiceProduit
Description: Create/update/delete services with image upload.

Title: Admin – Manage contact messages
Description: List MessageContact, mark processed (estTraite).

Title: Role-based Firestore/Storage rules
Description: Enforce admin/client/public access.

Title: Performance pass
Description: Compress images, lazy-load, caching; HTML renderer when suitable.

Title: Analytics + cookie banner
Description: Track traffic and conversions; RGPD consent.

Title: SEO meta in web/index.html
Description: title, description, og:*, favicon; routing fallback.

Title: Deploy to Firebase Hosting
Description: Custom domain, SSL, 404 fallback, cache headers.
